mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply(rno, f_no, reply, replyer) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{f_no}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply = #{reply}, updateDate = sysdate where rno =#{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, f_no, reply, replyer, replyDate, updateDate from tbl_reply where f_no = #{f_no} order by rno asc
